title: Drawing, "Oval Table, Rosewood and Lacquer", October 1933
medium: Graphite, red color pencil, and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Label affixed to lower left of drawing, in black ink: 47750 [circled in red color pencil]/1-East Indian Rosewood and/Lacquer Table./5'9" long x 3'0" wide/x 2'6" High./To be made knockdown con-/struction./Cust design/#7640/Oct. 26, 1933/sure
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite below label, lower left: Ships Oct. 26th; above label, upper right: Dark striped East Indian/Rosewood; lower left: Deskey # 7640; in graphite on verso, lower right: Deskey's # 7640/#47750
description: Plan and elevation drawing for long, oval table. Top of table in East Indian Rosewood, black lacquer apron. Oval ring on surface of table in black lacquer. Two pedestal legs at each end; inner section of leg in rosewood, outer section and base in black lacquer.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Oval Table, Rosewood and Lacquer", October 1933. Graphite, red color pencil, and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-825.
